p: In the anti-trypanosomal and cytotoxicity assays, alamar blue was obtained from Thermo Fisher Scientific (Merelbeke, Belgium); tetrazolium salt MTT (3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide), suramin, and camptothecin were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich (Bornem, Belgium). The fluorescence or absorbance was measured on a spectrophotometer (SpectraMax-Molecular Devices, Berkshire, UK).
